answers.answer: Just got done with my 3 hour one. Fun fun. 130 and below is normal I think. If over that they will have you do a 3 hour test where you fast. Blood taken 4 times. If you fail they have you talk to a nutritionist have you monitor your blood sugar 4 times a day. And if need be,  give you insulin...
diabetes runs in my family as well thats why my Dr had me do 1hr one during first trimester 130 is normal. I was at 87. Next visit I'll be doing it again hopefully 1 hr one as well.

question: So next month ima do the glucose test. Um do any of you onow what it mean when your body reacts negative to it and not the way it should? Just wondering because dibeties does run in my family on both sides.
title: glucose test
